field.name: id
field.title: Event ID
field.comment: Event

field.name: title
field.title: Event Title
field.comment: Event Title (e.g. Fall Fundraiser Dinner)

field.name: summary
field.title: Event Summary
field.comment: Brief summary of event. Text and html allowed. Displayed on Event Registration form and can be used on other CMS pages which need an event summary.

field.name: description
field.title: Event Description
field.comment: Full description of event. Text and html allowed. Displayed on built-in Event Information screens.

field.name: event_type_id
field.title: Event Type
field.comment: Event Type ID.Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = event_type.

field.name: participant_listing_id
field.title: Participant Listing
field.comment: Should we expose the participant list? Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = participant_listing.

field.name: is_public
field.title: Is Event Public
field.comment: Public events will be included in the iCal feeds. Access to private event information may be limited using ACLs.

field.name: start_date
field.title: Event Start Date
field.comment: Date and time that event starts.

field.name: end_date
field.title: Event End Date
field.comment: Date and time that event ends. May be NULL if no defined end date/time

field.name: is_online_registration
field.title: Is Online Registration
field.comment: If true, include registration link on Event Info page.

field.name: registration_link_text
field.title: Event Registration Link Text
field.comment: Text for link to Event Registration form which is displayed on Event Information screen when is_online_registration is true.

field.name: registration_start_date
field.comment: Date and time that online registration starts.

field.name: registration_end_date
field.comment: Date and time that online registration ends.

field.name: max_participants
field.title: Max Participants
field.comment: Maximum number of registered participants to allow. After max is reached, a custom Event Full message is displayed. If NULL, allow unlimited number of participants.

field.name: event_full_text
field.title: Event Information
field.comment: Message to display on Event Information page and INSTEAD OF Event Registration form if maximum participants are signed up. Can include email address/info about getting on a waiting list, etc. Text and html allowed.

field.name: is_monetary
field.title: Is this a PAID event?
field.comment: If true, one or more fee amounts must be set and a Payment Processor must be configured for Online Event Registration.

field.name: contribution_type_id
field.comment: Contribution type assigned to paid event registrations for this event. Required if is_monetary is true.

field.name: financial_type_id
field.title: Financial Type
field.comment: Financial type assigned to paid event registrations for this event. Required if is_monetary is true.

field.name: payment_processor
field.comment: Payment Processors configured for this Event (if is_monetary is true)

field.name: is_map
field.title: Map Enabled
field.comment: Include a map block on the Event Information page when geocode info is available and a mapping provider has been specified?

field.name: is_active
field.title: Is Active
field.comment: Is this Event enabled or disabled/cancelled?

field.name: is_show_location
field.title: show location
field.comment: If true, show event location.

field.name: loc_block_id
field.title: Location Block ID
field.comment: FK to Location Block ID

field.name: receipt_text
field.comment: Receipt Text for off-line event participation

field.name: default_role_id
field.title: Default Role
field.comment: Participant role ID. Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = participant_role.

field.name: intro_text
field.title: Introductory Message
field.comment: Introductory message for Event Registration page. Text and html allowed. Displayed at the top of Event Registration form.

field.name: footer_text
field.title: Footer Message
field.comment: Footer message for Event Registration page. Text and html allowed. Displayed at the bottom of Event Registration form.

field.name: confirm_title
field.title: Confirmation Title
field.comment: Title for Confirmation page.

field.name: confirm_text
field.title: Confirm Text
field.comment: Introductory message for Event Registration page. Text and html allowed. Displayed at the top of Event Registration form.

field.name: confirm_footer_text
field.title: Footer Text
field.comment: Footer message for Event Registration page. Text and html allowed. Displayed at the bottom of Event Registration form.

field.name: is_email_confirm
field.title: Is confirm email
field.comment: If true, confirmation is automatically emailed to contact on successful registration.

field.name: confirm_email_text
field.title: Confirmation Email Text
field.comment: text to include above standard event info on confirmation email. emails are text-only, so do not allow html for now

field.name: confirm_from_name
field.title: Confirm From Name
field.comment: FROM email name used for confirmation emails.

field.name: confirm_from_email
field.title: Confirm From Email
field.comment: FROM email address used for confirmation emails.

field.name: cc_confirm
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to cc each time a confirmation is sent

field.name: bcc_confirm
field.comment: comma-separated list of email addresses to bcc each time a confirmation is sent

field.name: default_fee_id
field.title: Default Fee ID
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: default_discount_fee_id
field.title: Default Discount Fee ID
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: thankyou_title
field.title: ThankYou Title
field.comment: Title for ThankYou page.

field.name: thankyou_text
field.title: ThankYou Text
field.comment: ThankYou Text.

field.name: thankyou_footer_text
field.title: Footer Text
field.comment: Footer message.

field.name: is_pay_later
field.title: Pay Later Allowed
field.comment: if true - allows the user to send payment directly to the org later

field.name: pay_later_text
field.title: Pay Later Text
field.comment: The text displayed to the user in the main form

field.name: pay_later_receipt
field.title: Pay Later Receipt Text
field.comment: The receipt sent to the user instead of the normal receipt text

field.name: is_partial_payment
field.title: Partial Payments Enabled
field.comment: is partial payment enabled for this event

field.name: initial_amount_label
field.title: Initial Amount Label
field.comment: Initial amount label for partial payment

field.name: initial_amount_help_text
field.title: Initial Amount Help Text
field.comment: Initial amount help text for partial payment

field.name: min_initial_amount
field.title: Minimum Initial Amount
field.comment: Minimum initial amount for partial payment

field.name: is_multiple_registrations
field.title: Allow Multiple Registrations
field.comment: if true - allows the user to register multiple participants for event

field.name: max_additional_participants
field.title: Maximum number of additional participants per registration
field.comment: Maximum number of additional participants that can be registered on a single booking

field.name: allow_same_participant_emails
field.title: Does Event allow multiple registrations from same email address?
field.comment: if true - allows the user to register multiple registrations from same email address.

field.name: has_waitlist
field.title: Waitlist Enabled
field.comment: Whether the event has waitlist support.

field.name: requires_approval
field.comment: Whether participants require approval before they can finish registering.

field.name: expiration_time
field.comment: Expire pending but unconfirmed registrations after this many hours.

field.name: allow_selfcancelxfer
field.title: Allow Self-service Cancellation or Transfer
field.comment: Allow self service cancellation or transfer for event?

field.name: selfcancelxfer_time
field.title: Self-service Cancellation or Transfer Time
field.comment: Number of hours prior to event start date to allow self-service cancellation or transfer.

field.name: waitlist_text
field.comment: Text to display when the event is full, but participants can signup for a waitlist.

field.name: approval_req_text
field.comment: Text to display when the approval is required to complete registration for an event.

field.name: is_template
field.title: Is an Event Template
field.comment: whether the event has template

field.name: template_title
field.title: Event Template Title
field.comment: Event Template Title

field.name: created_id
field.title: Created By Contact ID
field.comment: FK to civicrm_contact, who created this event

field.name: created_date
field.title: Event Created Date
field.comment: Date and time that event was created.

field.name: currency
field.comment: 3 character string, value from config setting or input via user.

field.name: campaign_id
field.title: Campaign
field.comment: The campaign for which this event has been created.

field.name: is_share
field.title: Is shared through social media
field.comment: Can people share the event through social media?

field.name: is_confirm_enabled
field.title: Is the booking confirmation screen enabled?
field.comment: If false, the event booking confirmation screen gets skipped

field.name: parent_event_id
field.title: Parent Event ID
field.comment: Implicit FK to civicrm_event: parent event

field.name: slot_label_id
field.title: Subevent Slot Label ID
field.comment: Subevent slot label. Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value where option_group = conference_slot.

field.name: dedupe_rule_group_id
field.title: Dedupe Rule
field.comment: Rule to use when matching registrations for this event

field.name: is_billing_required
field.title: Is billing block required
field.comment: if true than billing block is required this event
